de.esoco.ewt.dialog

Class MessageBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.dialog.MessageBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.ClickHandler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler

    public class MessageBox
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.ClickHandler
    A message box class that allows to display a message in a standardized format to the user. Instances of this class cannot be created directly. Instead, it provides several static "showMessage" methods to display a message together with an image and several types of standard buttons centered on the screen.

    The following keys must exist in a application resource for message boxes: "$btnRetry", "$btnIgnore", "$btnYes", "$btnNo", "$btnOk", "$btnCancel" for the buttons and "$imQuestion", "$imInfo", "$imWarning", "$imError" for the images.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  MessageBox.ResultHandler
      Interface for the handling of message box results.

    • Method Detail

      • showCancelQuestion

        public static void showCancelQuestion(View rParent,
                                      java.lang.String sTitle,
                                      java.lang.String sMessage,
                                      int nIcon,
                                      MessageBox.ResultHandler rResultHandler)
        Shows a question message dialog with three buttons: Yes, No, and Cancel.
        Parameters:
        rParent - The parent view
        sTitle - The message box title
        sMessage - The message text to display
        nIcon - The type constant of the icon to display
        rResultHandler - The handler for the message box result

      • showConfirmation

        public static void showConfirmation(View rParent,
                                    java.lang.String sTitle,
                                    java.lang.String sMessage,
                                    int nIcon,
                                    MessageBox.ResultHandler rResultHandler)
        Shows a confirmation dialog. The dialog will have the buttons OK and Cancel.
        Parameters:
        rParent - The parent view
        sTitle - The message box title
        sMessage - The message text to display
        nIcon - The type constant of the icon to display
        rResultHandler - The handler for the message box result

      • showNotification

        public static void showNotification(View rParent,
                                    java.lang.String sTitle,
                                    java.lang.String sMessage,
                                    int nIcon)
        Shows a notification dialog. The dialog will have a single OK button and therefore doesn't need a result handler.
        Parameters:
        rParent - The parent view
        sTitle - The message box title
        sMessage - The message text to display
        nIcon - The type constant of the icon to display

      • showQuestion

        public static void showQuestion(View rParent,
                                java.lang.String sTitle,
                                java.lang.String sMessage,
                                int nIcon,
                                MessageBox.ResultHandler rResultHandler)
        Shows a question message dialog. The dialog will have the buttons 'Yes' and 'No'.
        Parameters:
        rParent - The parent view
        sTitle - The message box title
        sMessage - The message text to display
        nIcon - The type constant of the icon to display
        rResultHandler - The handler for the message box result
